nodes.text: Wild Seven was the callsign assigned to the seventh pilot of the New Republic's Wild Squadron. During the Galactic Civil War, a pilot was designated this callsign during hunt for the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, where the pilot flew an off-model X-wing starfighter, which was too heavily modified for Flare Squadron, and so was a perfect fit for the misfits and unusual mix of starfighters of Wild Squadron. The pilot participated in a skirmish in the G'Tep'Noi system and then later at the Battle of Jakku.
Wild Seven first appeared in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
